directions: In a large bowl, whisk together lime juice, sugar, and ginger. Gradually add oil and season with salt and pepper to taste.
Add watercress, watermelon, and cantaloupe to dressing and toss to coat. Transfer salad to plates, sprinkle with sliced almonds and serve immediately.
ingredients: ⅓ cup toasted and sliced almonds
title: Watercress, Melon and Almond Salad
